Prisms Of Reality

Full Time VR Developer / Project Lead

In June of 2020, I began working at Prisms Of Reality on a prototype education module for high school algebra, I was the first full time Unity developer on staff. With support from the National Science Foundation we completed this first module and embarked on developing a full course.

Over the last 3 years we at Prisms have completed multiple courses for STEM Education and have become an industry leading edTech company with our product being used in public schools across the United States and abroad. With my work influencing the lives of thousands of students, I can safely say this is my most important and fulfilling work to date.

Dustin Milotte || Copyright © 2023
